title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, May 18, 2020
description: On this day in 1860––160 years ago––Abraham Lincoln was nominated for president at the Republican National Convention in Chicago.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1860––160 years ago––Abraham Lincoln was nominated for president at the Republican National Convention in Chicago.
